mdRecord.dcterms:title: Von Frieling's green butter salve
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 2 glass jars containing salve; labels in poor condition. Directions state that Von Frieling's salve is to be used for cuts, boils, carbuncles, abscess and inflammation, and blood poisoning from shot wounds, snake, insect or animal bite, burns and scalds. See the Claude Moore Health Science Library's "Von Frieling's Salve Collection" (MS-65) for more information.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pharmaceutical technology--Ointments
